experience.title: Freelance Sound Designer & Composer
experience.description: Sonic Assembly is a sound design and music production company that specializes in creating audio for video games, film, and other media. I work with clients to create custom sound effects, music, and voiceovers that enhance their projects. Have completed projects for Google, Fujifilm, Polar Skate Company and more.

experience.title: Project Leader
experience.description: STPLN is a creative community center that offers workshops, events, and coworking spaces for artists, designers, and makers. As a project leader, I managed a team of volunteers and organized events, workshops, and exhibitions. I also developed partnerships with local businesses and organizations to support our programs.

experience.title: Creative Director
experience.description: Connectors Society is a creative agency that specializes in branding, marketing, and design. As creative director, I led a team of designers, copywriters, and marketers to create campaigns for clients in the fashion, lifestyle, and entertainment industries. I also managed client relationships and developed new business opportunities.

experience.title: Workshop Leader
experience.description: Glokala Fölkhögskolan is a community college that offers courses in art, design, and social entrepreneurship. As a workshop leader, I developed and taught classes in sound design, music production, and digital media. I also mentored students and provided feedback on their projects.
